name: Croc Runner (VS1Toronto)
description:
A safari keeper wakes up in an animal enclosure convinced it's his fellow workers idea of a practical joke.....little does he know something far more sinister is underway.

The ICA the international intelligence agency has been training animals to kill people.....why send a human to do it when you can dump a deranged monster on the front lawn during the night and if it get's caught it's not as if it can talk is it?

Unfortunately there has been a recent change in government and the agency lost funding for certain projects.....easy enough to get rid of the beasts but what to do wth the human keepers after they'd begun suspecting something was wrong proved a problem until an agent came up with a great idea.....   RELEASE THE ANIMALS!!!
